mapper.select:
SELECT RESERVATION_NO, PAYMENT_NO, MEMBER_NO, CAMP_NO, CAMP_DE_NO, CAMP_ENTDATE, CAMP_OUTDATE, ADULT_COUNT, KID_COUNT, DEMAND,
(SELECT CAMP_NAME FROM CAMPING_SITE WHERE CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO) CAMP_NAME,
(SELECT CAMP_ADDRESS FROM CAMPING_SITE WHERE CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO) CAMP_ADDRESS,
(SELECT CAMP_DE_NAME FROM CAMPING_DETAIL WHERE CAMP_DE_NO = A.CAMP_DE_NO) CAMP_DE_NAME,
(SELECT (CAMP_IMG_PATH || CAMP_IMG_RENAME) FROM CAMPING_SITE_IMG WHERE CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO AND CAMP_IMG_ORDER = 0) THUMBNAIL,
(SELECT CAMP_PAYMENT FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENT_NO = A.PAYMENT_NO) CAMP_PAYMENT,
(SELECT PAYMENT_TYPE FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENT_NO = A.PAYMENT_NO) PAYMENT_TYPE
FROM RESERVATIONS A WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY CAMP_ENTDATE

SELECT WISHLIST_NO, MEMBER_NO, CAMP_NO, ITEM_NO,
(SELECT ITEM_NAME FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_NO = A.ITEM_NO) ITEM_NAME,
(SELECT (ITEM_IMG_PATH || ITEM_IMG_RENAME) FROM ITEM_IMG WHERE ITEM_NO = A.ITEM_NO AND ITEM_IMG_ORDER = 0) THUMBNAIL
FROM WISH_LIST A WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND CAMP_NO IS NULL

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, RENTAL_ITEM_QUANTITY, ITEM_NO, RENTAL_PAYMENT_NO, (SELECT ITEM_NAME FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_NO = A.ITEM_NO) ITEM_NAME, (SELECT ITEM_PRICE FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_NO = A.ITEM_NO) ITEM_PRICE, (SELECT RENTAL_PAYMENT_TOTAL FROM RENTAL_PAYMENT WHERE RENTAL_PAYMENT_NO = A.RENTAL_PAYMENT_NO AND PAYMENT_STATUS_FL = 'Y') RENTAL_PAYMENT_TOTAL, (SELECT RENTAL_PAYMENT_TYPE FROM RENTAL_PAYMENT WHERE RENTAL_PAYMENT_NO = A.RENTAL_PAYMENT_NO AND PAYMENT_STATUS_FL = 'Y') RENTAL_PAYMENT_TYPE, (SELECT ITEM_IMG_PATH || ITEM_IMG_RENAME FROM ITEM_IMG WHERE ITEM_IMG_ORDER=0 AND ITEM_NO = A.ITEM_NO) THUMBNAIL FROM RENTAL_PAYMENT_ITEM A WHERE RESERVATION_NO = #{resNo}

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_TYPE, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') AS ENROLL_DATE FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
SELECT MEMBER_PW FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
